DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to explore whether asking participants to visualise a secure attachment figure or a neutral event leads to differences in self-reported felt security or depressed mood. Furthermore, the investigators aim to explore whether it is possible to keep a secure prime activated over 3 days via text message visualisation tasks.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Repeated Attachment Security Priming on Depressed Mood: a Clinical Study
DOC.criteria: Anxiety and depressive symptoms Bipolar disorder
